attributes.action: consider the publics right to vote on Government proposals via the Number 10 website.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As a member of the public I find it very disheartening to hear news reports that the government have voted yet again on behalf of the nation to spend money on this or send troops there or new tax on them. Public opinion is important everyday not just at the elections.
